"Brigitta":
"We must verify the truthfulness of the
statements from the witnesses.
Let's move inwards."

"If we go back, we have to fight the
Dummies.
We have to move inwards now."

なりません。奥へ進みましょう。"

今は奥へと進みましょう。"
